terms.title: [HI] Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: [HI] Please read these terms carefully before using our B2B marketplace platform. By using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.
terms.welcomeDesc: [HI] These Terms of Service govern your use of our premium B2B marketplace platform that connects fruit and vegetable growers with buyers worldwide. We're committed to providing a secure, transparent, and efficient trading environment for all our users.
terms.questionsDesc: [HI] If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact our legal team. We're here to help clarify any concerns you may have.
terms.section1Content:
[HI] By accessing and using Fruit Habibi ("the Platform"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of our B2B marketplace platform that connects premium fruit and vegetable growers with trusted buyers worldwide. By creating an account or using our services, you agree to these terms.
terms.section2Content:
[HI] Fruit Habibi provides a digital marketplace platform that enables:

тАв Product listing and discovery services
тАв Secure payment processing with escrow protection
тАв Communication tools between buyers and sellers
тАв Quality verification and dispute resolution
тАв International shipping coordination
тАв Business verification and trust scoring

We act as an intermediary platform and do not directly sell or purchase products listed by users.
terms.section3Content:
[HI] To use our platform, you must:

тАв Provide accurate and complete business information
тАв Maintain the security of your account credentials
тАв Complete business verification process
тАв Comply with all applicable laws and regulations

We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms or engage in fraudulent activities. Business verification is required for all sellers and recommended for buyers.

You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account and must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use.
terms.section4Content:
[HI] Users are strictly prohibited from:

тАв Listing counterfeit, illegal, or prohibited products
тАв Providing false or misleading product information
тАв Attempting to circumvent our payment system
тАв Engaging in fraudulent transactions
тАв Violating intellectual property rights
тАв Harassment or abuse of other users
тАв Manipulating reviews or ratings
тАв Using automated systems to access the platform
тАв Selling products outside of permitted categories

Violations may result in immediate account suspension and legal action.
terms.section5Content:
[HI] Payment Terms:

тАв All transactions are processed through our secure escrow system
тАв Platform fee: 3% of transaction value (2.5% for verified premium sellers)
тАв Payment processing fees may apply
тАв Refunds are subject to our dispute resolution process

Buyers pay upfront, and sellers receive payment after successful delivery confirmation. We hold funds in escrow to protect both parties during the transaction.

All fees are clearly displayed before transaction completion. Currency conversion rates apply for international transactions.
terms.section6Content:
[HI] Dispute Process:

1. Direct Communication: Users must attempt to resolve issues directly first
2. Platform Mediation: Our team will mediate if direct resolution fails
3. Evidence Review: Both parties must provide relevant documentation
4. Resolution Timeline: Standard disputes resolved within 7 business days
5. Appeal Process: Users can appeal decisions within 48 hours

We reserve the right to:
тАв Issue full or partial refunds
тАв Suspend accounts during investigation
тАв Adjust trust scores based on dispute outcomes
тАв Escalate to legal authorities for serious violations

Our decision is binding unless overturned through the appeal process.
terms.section7Content:
[HI] Intellectual Property Rights:

тАв Users retain ownership of their product listings and content
тАв Users grant us license to display and promote their content on the platform
тАв We own all platform technology, design, and proprietary systems
тАв Trademark infringement is strictly prohibited
тАв Users must have rights to all images and content they upload

We respect intellectual property rights and will remove infringing content upon notification. Users who repeatedly infringe on IP rights may have their accounts terminated.
terms.section8Content:
[HI] Data Protection:

тАв We collect and process data as described in our Privacy Policy
тАв User data is protected with industry-standard security measures
тАв We may share data with trusted partners for service delivery
тАв Users can request data deletion subject to legal requirements
тАв International data transfers comply with applicable regulations

By using our platform, you consent to our data collection and processing practices. We are committed to protecting your privacy and maintaining data security.
terms.section9Content:
[HI] Liability Limitations:

тАв Our platform is provided "as is" without warranties
тАв We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages
тАв Our total liability is limited to fees paid to us in the preceding 12 months
тАв We do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free service
тАв Users are responsible for their own business decisions

We act as an intermediary platform and are not responsible for:
тАв Product quality or condition
тАв Delivery delays or issues
тАв Business disputes between users
тАв Third-party service failures

Users participate at their own risk and should conduct due diligence.
terms.section10Content:
[HI] Account Termination:

We may suspend or terminate accounts for:
тАв Violation of these Terms of Service
тАв Fraudulent or illegal activities
тАв Non-payment of fees
тАв Misrepresentation of business information
тАв Harassment of other users

Users may terminate their accounts at any time by contacting support. Upon termination:
тАв Active transactions must be completed
тАв Outstanding fees must be paid
тАв Account data may be retained for legal compliance
тАв User content may be removed from public view
terms.section11Content:
[HI] Global Trade Requirements:

тАв Users must comply with all applicable international trade laws
тАв Export/import regulations must be followed
тАв Sanctions and embargo restrictions apply
тАв Customs documentation is user responsibility
тАв We may restrict transactions based on compliance requirements

Users are responsible for:
тАв Obtaining necessary permits and licenses
тАв Complying with destination country regulations
тАв Accurate customs declarations
тАв Payment of applicable duties and taxes

We reserve the right to block transactions that may violate trade laws.
terms.section12Content:
[HI] Modifications:

тАв We may update these Terms of Service from time to time
тАв Users will be notified of significant changes via email
тАв Continued use constitutes acceptance of new terms
тАв Users may terminate accounts if they disagree with changes
тАв Previous versions are available upon request

Changes may be made to:
тАв Reflect new services or features
тАв Comply with legal requirements
тАв Improve user experience
тАв Address security concerns

We encourage users to review terms periodically.

sellerOnboarding.onboardingCompleteDesc: [HI] You're all set to start selling on Fruit Habibi. Your seller account is now active.

help.faqGettingStartedQ1: [HI] How do I create an account?
help.faqGettingStartedA1: [HI] Click 'Create Account' on our homepage, fill in your business details, and verify your email. Complete your profile to start listing or purchasing products.
help.faqGettingStartedQ2: [HI] What information do I need to verify my account?
help.faqGettingStartedA2: [HI] We require business registration documents, tax identification, and contact information. For sellers, we also need quality certifications and shipping capabilities.
help.faqGettingStartedQ3: [HI] How long does account verification take?
help.faqGettingStartedA3: [HI] Standard verification takes 1-3 business days. Premium verification with priority support takes 24 hours.
help.faqBuyingSellingQ1: [HI] How does the payment system work?
help.faqBuyingSellingA1: [HI] We use secure escrow payments. Funds are held until delivery confirmation. Buyers pay upfront, and sellers receive payment after successful delivery.
help.faqBuyingSellingA2: [HI] We charge a 3% commission on successful transactions. Premium sellers (verified businesses) get reduced fees of 2.5%.
help.faqBuyingSellingQ3: [HI] How do I list my products?
help.faqBuyingSellingA3: [HI] Go to your dashboard, click 'Create Listing', upload high-quality images, add detailed descriptions, set pricing, and specify shipping options.
help.faqBuyingSellingA4: [HI] Yes! Use our messaging system to negotiate with buyers/sellers directly. Final prices are updated before payment processing.
help.faqShippingA1: [HI] Sellers specify shipping methods and costs. We partner with global logistics providers for international shipping with tracking.
help.faqShippingQ2: [HI] What if my product arrives damaged?
help.faqShippingA2: [HI] Report damage within 48 hours of delivery. We'll initiate a dispute resolution process and may provide refunds or replacements.
help.faqShippingA3: [HI] Yes! We facilitate global trade with customs documentation, international shipping partners, and compliance with local regulations.
help.faqSafetyA1: [HI] We verify business licenses, tax documents, quality certifications, and conduct background checks. Verified sellers get special badges.
help.faqSafetyQ2: [HI] What if a seller doesn't deliver?
help.faqSafetyA2: [HI] Our dispute resolution system handles non-delivery cases. You can get full refunds and we take action against problematic sellers.
help.faqSafetyA3: [HI] Absolutely. We use bank-level encryption, PCI DSS compliance, and never store your full payment details on our servers.
help.faqTechnicalA1: [HI] Try resetting your password or contact support. We'll verify your identity and restore access within 24 hours.
help.faqTechnicalA2: [HI] Check your internet connection and clear browser cache. If issues persist, contact our technical support team.
help.faqTechnicalQ3: [HI] How do I update my business information?
help.faqTechnicalA3: [HI] Go to your profile settings, update your information, and submit for re-verification if you've changed business details.

privacy.title: [HI] Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: [HI] Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information on our B2B marketplace platform.
privacy.welcomeDesc: [HI] At Fruit Habibi, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains our practices regarding the collection, use, and protection of information when you use our B2B marketplace platform. We believe in transparency and giving you control over your personal data.
privacy.questionsDesc: [HI] If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your personal information, please don't hesitate to contact our privacy team. We're here to help.
privacy.section1Content:
[HI] Personal Information:

тАв Business contact information (name, email, phone, address)
тАв Business registration and tax identification details
тАв Payment and banking information (processed securely)
тАв Identity verification documents
тАв Product listings and descriptions
тАв Communication records with other users

Technical Information:

тАв IP addresses and device information
тАв Browser type and version
тАв Usage patterns and platform interactions
тАв Cookies and similar tracking technologies
тАв Location data (if provided or detected)

We collect this information to provide our services, verify identities, process transactions, and improve our platform functionality.
privacy.section2Content:
[HI] Service Provision:

тАв Creating and maintaining your account
тАв Processing transactions and payments
тАв Facilitating communication between users
тАв Providing customer support
тАв Verifying business credentials

Platform Improvement:

тАв Analyzing usage patterns to improve services
тАв Developing new features and functionality
тАв Conducting research and analytics
тАв Personalizing user experience
тАв Preventing fraud and abuse

Legal Compliance:

тАв Meeting regulatory requirements
тАв Responding to legal requests
тАв Protecting our rights and interests
тАв Ensuring platform security
тАв Maintaining transaction records

We use your information only for legitimate business purposes and in compliance with applicable laws.
privacy.section3Content:
[HI] We may share your information in the following circumstances:

With Other Users:
тАв Business contact information for transaction purposes
тАв Product listings and descriptions
тАв Public profile information (if you choose to make it public)

With Service Providers:
тАв Payment processors for transaction handling
тАв Shipping and logistics partners
тАв Cloud storage and hosting providers
тАв Customer support tools
тАв Analytics and marketing services

Legal Requirements:
тАв When required by law or legal process
тАв To protect our rights and property
тАв In case of emergency to protect safety
тАв To comply with government requests

Business Transfers:
тАв In case of merger, acquisition, or sale of assets
тАв With your explicit consent for other purposes

We never sell your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes.
privacy.section4Content:
[HI] Security Measures:

тАв Encryption of data in transit and at rest
тАв Secure servers with regular security updates
тАв Access controls and authentication systems
тАв Regular security audits and assessments
тАв Employee training on data protection

Technical Safeguards:

тАв SSL/TLS encryption for all communications
тАв Multi-factor authentication for sensitive operations
тАв Regular backup and disaster recovery procedures
тАв Intrusion detection and prevention systems
тАв Secure coding practices and vulnerability testing

Data Breach Response:

тАв Immediate investigation and containment
тАв Notification to affected users within 72 hours
тАв Cooperation with law enforcement if required
тАв Implementation of additional security measures
тАв Regular updates on resolution progress

While we implement industry-standard security measures, no system is 100% secure. We continuously work to improve our security practices.
privacy.section5Content:
[HI] Retention Periods:

Account Information:
тАв Active accounts: Retained while account is active
тАв Closed accounts: Retained for 7 years for legal compliance
тАв Suspended accounts: Retained until resolution or permanent closure

Transaction Data:
тАв Payment records: 7 years for tax and legal compliance
тАв Communication logs: 3 years for dispute resolution
тАв Product listings: Until account closure or removal

Technical Data:
тАв Log files: 1 year for security and performance monitoring
тАв Analytics data: 2 years for platform improvement
тАв Cookies: As specified in our cookie policy

Legal Requirements:

тАв Financial records: 7 years minimum
тАв Identity verification: 5 years after account closure
тАв Legal proceedings: Until resolution plus applicable statute of limitations

You may request deletion of certain personal information, subject to legal and operational requirements.
privacy.section6Content:
[HI] Your Rights:

Access and Portability:
тАв Request copies of your personal information
тАв Receive data in a portable format
тАв Understand how we use your information

Correction and Updates:
тАв Correct inaccurate personal information
тАв Update your account information
тАв Modify your privacy preferences

Deletion and Restriction:
тАв Request deletion of personal information
тАв Restrict processing of your data
тАв Object to certain data processing activities

Communication Preferences:
тАв Opt out of marketing communications
тАв Choose notification preferences
тАв Manage cookie settings

How to Exercise Your Rights:

тАв Contact us through our support channels
тАв Use account settings for basic preferences
тАв Submit formal requests for complex changes
тАв Provide identification for security verification

We will respond to your requests within 30 days, subject to verification and legal requirements.
privacy.section7Content:
[HI] Global Operations:

тАв Our platform serves users worldwide
тАв Data may be transferred across international borders
тАв We ensure adequate protection for all transfers

Transfer Mechanisms:

тАв Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs)
тАв Adequacy decisions by relevant authorities
тАв Binding Corporate Rules where applicable
тАв User consent for specific transfers

Regional Compliance:

European Union (GDPR):
тАв Full compliance with GDPR requirements
тАв Data Protection Officer appointed
тАв Privacy by design principles implemented

United States:
тАв Compliance with applicable state and federal laws
тАв CCPA and other state privacy law compliance

Other Jurisdictions:
тАв Local privacy law compliance where applicable
тАв Regular review of regulatory changes

We ensure that international transfers meet the highest standards of data protection.
privacy.section8Content:
[HI] Types of Cookies:

Essential Cookies:
тАв Required for platform functionality
тАв Authentication and security features
тАв Shopping cart and session management

Performance Cookies:
тАв Analytics and usage statistics
тАв Platform performance monitoring
тАв Error tracking and debugging

Functional Cookies:
тАв User preferences and settings
тАв Language and localization
тАв Enhanced user experience features

Marketing Cookies:
тАв Advertising and promotional content
тАв User behavior analysis
тАв Targeted marketing communications

Cookie Management:

тАв Cookie consent banner on first visit
тАв Granular control over cookie categories
тАв Easy opt-out mechanisms
тАв Regular review of cookie usage

You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings or our cookie management tools.
privacy.section9Content:
[HI] Age Restrictions:

тАв Our platform is not intended for children under 16
тАв We do not knowingly collect information from children
тАв Business accounts require adult verification

Parental Rights:

тАв Parents can request information about their child's account
тАв Right to review and delete child's information
тАв Notification of data collection from children

If we discover we have collected information from a child without parental consent, we will delete that information immediately.
privacy.section10Content:
[HI] Integrated Services:

Payment Processing:
тАв Secure payment gateways
тАв PCI DSS compliant processors
тАв Limited data sharing for transaction processing

Shipping and Logistics:
тАв International shipping partners
тАв Tracking and delivery services
тАв Customs and compliance data

Analytics and Marketing:
тАв Website analytics providers
тАв Marketing automation tools
тАв Customer relationship management systems

Third-Party Policies:

тАв Each service has its own privacy policy
тАв We vet partners for privacy compliance
тАв Limited data sharing for specific purposes
тАв Regular review of third-party practices

We are not responsible for the privacy practices of third-party services. Users should review third-party privacy policies before using integrated services.
privacy.section11Content:
[HI] Policy Updates:

тАв We may update this privacy policy periodically
тАв Significant changes will be communicated via email
тАв Updated policies will be posted on our website
тАв Previous versions are available upon request

Notification Process:

тАв Email notification for material changes
тАв Website banner for important updates
тАв Account notification for significant changes
тАв 30-day notice for substantial modifications

User Rights:

тАв Right to review updated policies
тАв Option to accept or reject changes
тАв Ability to close account if disagreeing with changes
тАв Continued use constitutes acceptance

We encourage users to review our privacy policy regularly to stay informed about our practices.
privacy.section12Content:
[HI] Data Protection Officer:

Email: privacy@fruithabibi.com
Phone: +1 (555) 123-4567
Address: Data Protection Office, Fruit Habibi Inc., 123 Business Plaza, Suite 456, San Francisco, CA 94105, USA

General Privacy Inquiries:

Email: support@fruithabibi.com
Help Center: /help
Contact Form: /contact

Legal Requests:

Email: legal@fruithabibi.com
For law enforcement and legal process requests

Response Times:

тАв General inquiries: 48 hours
тАв Privacy rights requests: 30 days
тАв Legal requests: As required by law
тАв Security incidents: 72 hours for notification

We are committed to addressing all privacy concerns promptly and thoroughly.
